**Entry Strategy:**
- Enter with 50% position now
- Reserve 50% for potential dips
- Use elevated volatility (VIX 20.64) to enter on pullbacks
- Target average entry around $295-300

**Position Management:**
- Set stop-loss at $275 (-9.4%)
- Take partial profits at $335 (mean target)
- Hold core position for cloud growth story
- Max position size: 3-5% of portfolio due to high valuation

### For Options Traders

**Recommendation:** Sell Premium (Volatility is Elevated)

**Rationale:**
- VIX at 20.64 means high options premiums
- Bullish sentiment supports selling puts
- Elevated IV makes buying calls expensive

**Strategy Ideas:**
- **Bull Put Spreads:** Sell puts 5-10% below current price
- **Covered Calls:** If long stock, sell calls at $320-330
- **Cash-Secured Puts:** Sell $285-290 puts to get paid to wait
- **Avoid:** Buying calls outright (expensive due to high IV)
